panels.content:
Setup



Inverter a Solis 5K-G Single Phase Inverter
18 Panels (unkown brand), total 5220wp, orientation west
LAN log stick connected to the inverter is logging to the GinLong cloud. Data is then scraped every 5 minutes from json pages and imported in influxdb via a custom made python script.

alert.message: No power production, check inverter or panel!
alert.name: PV Generated Power alert
